message: Let's be fair and split the money while it's still worth something. This offer gives us both a good share.
Let's split it with a bit more in my favor, considering the inflation hits you harder
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. I'm taking a small hit here to incentivize a deal. This offer is still favorable to me considering the faster inflation, so take it while you can!
You said it yourself, inflation is hitting you harder. I'm willing to take a bit more, considering it's still worth more to me than it will be later.
Bob, we're running out of time! This is a compromise - slightly more for me than your last offer, but it still gets us both a decent amount while we can still get it!
